    • Method Detail

      • findParameterizedTypeFor

        public static java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType findParameterizedTypeFor(java.lang.Class<?> concreteType,
                                                                           java.lang.Class<?> rawType)
        The method tries to find and return a ParameterizedType in the inheritance hierarchy (ancestors) of the specified concreteType, who's raw type is the specified rawType .
        Parameters:
        concreteType - the concrete implementation type to start with the search, cannot be null, and must be a subtype of the rawType .
        rawType - the raw type of the ParameterizedType to search, cannot be null and must be a super type of the concreteType .
        Returns:
        the ParameterizedType found, or null if none found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when either parameter is null, or when concreteType is not a sub type of rawType .

      • findSuperTypes

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> findSuperTypes(java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
